#summary Provides an action to locate the current file in the Solution Explorer
[http://www.rorybecker.co.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/DX_LocateInSolutionExplorer/ http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Download.png]      [http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/InstallInstructions  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/InstallHelp.png]
[http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/Feedback  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Feedback.png]
===== Requires DXCore 10.2 since build 1732 =====
=== Introduction ===
A simple plugin to locate the currently active file in the solution explorer

=== Configuration ===
Bind the *!LocateInSolExplorer* to a key ([http://community.devexpress.com/blogs/rorybecker/archive/2010/10/05/binding-keys-in-coderush.aspx see Binding keys in CodeRush])

=== Usage ===
Simply press the configured shortcut combo whenever you want to locate the current file.
